directions: Melt chocolate chips in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, about 5 minutes.

Blend melted chocolate, tofu, maple syrup, and vanilla extract together in a food processor or blender until smooth. Add milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, to tofu mixture with the food processor on high until mousse is creamy and pudding-consistency. Pour mousse into a serving dish and refrigerate until set, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag dark chocolate chips (such as Ghirardelli® 60% Cacao)
1 (12 ounce) package low-fat silken tofu, at room temperature
title: Chocolate I-Can't-Believe-It-Has-Tofu Mousse
